empty_board.heading: Let's Add some pedals!
empty_board.description: Select pedals from the list, sort them according to you signal chain and even add some knobs to each of them

empty_knobs.heading: Add some knobs!
empty_knobs.description: Add knobs like this one with a name and a value (1 - 10) to show how your pedal is configured
empty_knobs.description_public: No knobs have been added to this pedal yet
